modShortDescription: A light weight mod that displays a rough percentage of health on your targets. This only appears after you have damaged them.
modDescription:
A light weight mod that displays a rough percentage of health on your targets. This only appears after you have damaged them. This version uses the texture (created by Mumpfy) from the first health bars mod.

Does not require restart.

Requires client to install as well as server.

Tested and works with Alpha 20.4 (b42).

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Fixed an issue with double health bars for vultures on the healthbars mods. No need to restart world or anything.
* Updated for A20.

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/kitylxk057820kf/TelricsHealthBarsV1A20.zip?dl=1)** for A20  
**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/32jy2t0xjj5h3m3/Telrics%20Health%20Bars%202.0A19.zip?dl=1)** for A19

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26175-telrics-a20-modlets-new-mod-added-12152021/).

**Credits:** [Telric](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/telric/)  
_Special Thanks:_ Mumpfy
